tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE users (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,    role ENUM('admin', 'user') NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE device_access (
    access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    access_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (access_id) REFERENCES device_access(access_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
